text: was a town located in Asakuchi District, Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 6,529 and a density of 724.64 persons per km². The total area was 9.01 km². On March 21, 2006, Yorishima, along with the towns of Kamogata and Konkō (all from Asakuchi District), was merged to create the city of Asakuchi. Category:Dissolved municipalities of Okayama Prefecture
title: Yorishima, Okayama
